measurement_conditions: 95th percentile (P95) server-side latency for APIs like Login, Add to Cart, Order Status Update.
business_relevance: Direct impact on user experience and app responsiveness.

measurement_conditions: For core dashboard web pages (Vendor, Admin).
load_profile: Simulated user on a standard network connection.
improvement_opportunities: Code splitting, image optimization, reducing main-thread work.
business_relevance: User satisfaction for business users (Vendors, Admins).

load_profile: A mix of user actions simulating 100 new orders per minute.
